message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to us, we're confident it would be a great addition to your collection. We're willing to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $900,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree your product is great, that price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $700,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on our product, I believe we can find common ground. I am willing to consider a price of $850,000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  However, $850,000 is still too high for my budget. I can do $750,000.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $825,000. This price reflects a balance between the value of the product to both parties.
Alice, we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about $787,500?
Thank you for your flexibility, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to accept an offer of $812,500 for the product.
